The examples on ARROW-8726 no longer error, and the error message they raised no longer exists in r/src.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9028?focusedCommentId=17200729) by Romain Francois (romainfrancois):*
Might not be related, but maybe we can have something to create an empty table of a given schema: 

Table$create(schema = schema(x = int32()))
